name: JJJ
description:
STORY

Jim's old house was unoccupied for the summer, so the three friends decided to move in together. A wonderful vacation was expecting, but something horrible happened.

Escape from the manor house and explore the garden with statuettes to get and easter eggs to find. Ah, there's a small detail, you won't be alone...




ENVIROMENT

Explore the garden engulfed in darkness without getting caught by the beast. The manor is your safe place, full of tools and a music box that is best not to be near for too long...



CHARACTER

You can't wait to spend some time with your best friends Jim and Jhon.

Run to the gardener who can't wait to greet you.

Can you figure out who Professor Terry is?




FIND THE STATUETTES

There are seven statuettes to find. Will you be able to find them all?
